08-15.text: 2005 – Chris released the single 'Run It!' which hit #1 on the Billboard Hot 100.
2011 – Chris performed at the MTV Video Music Awards.

08-18.text: 2023 – Chris Brown premiered his Music Video for Summer Too Hot - https://youtu.be/qxTqRFSWmm8?si=_dS3RhnSra4r_QmJ

08-22.text: 2011 – Chris Brown arrives at the Reebok Classics party at Project in Las Vegas, Nevada.

09-05.text: 2009 – Chris began the 'Fan Appreciation' tour in the U.S.
